thread.title: Halep races to win, Maria wins marathon
thread.title_full: Halep races to win, Maria wins marathon

author: tribuneindia.com
title: Halep races to win, Maria wins marathon
text:
Singapore, October 25
Romania's Simona Halep kicked off her campaign for a maiden WTA Finals title in emphatic fashion with a thumping 6-0 6-3 victory over Flavia Pennetta in the first match of the eight-woman season-ending tournament. While the opener proved to be a sprint, the second 'Red Group' tie was a marathon when Maria Sharapova beat Agnieszka Radwanska 4-6 6-3 6-4 in a full-blooded encounter marked by several swings in momentum. â€” Reuters
